data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ramos-Tafur, Gabriel E. (2018): Alpheus luiszapatai, a new species of rare and colorful deep water alpheid shrimp (Crustacea: Decapoda: Alpheidae) from Arusí, Chocó Department, Pacific Coast of Colombia. Zootaxa 4403 (3): 540-556, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4403.3.7|18 occurrences
